title: WordPress SEO Fundamentals
description: Master the basics of Search Engine Optimization for your WordPress website.

blocks.content: Learn how to optimize your WordPress website for search engines and improve your rankings with these essential SEO techniques.

Essential on-page optimization:

  • Title tag optimization
  • Meta description best practices
  • Header tag hierarchy
  • Internal linking strategy
  • Image alt text optimization

Technical optimization tips:

  • XML sitemap configuration
  • Robots.txt setup
  • Mobile optimization
  • Schema markup implementation
  • Site structure planning

author: admin
